info.gateways.gate_pearl:
A Gate Pearl allows you to summon a Gateway by using it on a block.

There will need to be sufficient space available, and another Gateway cannot already be open.
info.gateways.gate_pearl.2:
An open Gateway will fail in a burst of lightning if it cannot spawn a mob, any active mob walks too far away, or the wave timer elapses.

Rewards will spawn from the Gateway as they are obtained.
error.gateways.no_space: There's not enough space to open this Gateway!
error.gateways.wave_failed: The Gateway imploded because there was not enough space to spawn the next wave!
error.gateways.too_far: The Gateway imploded because a wave entity ran too far away!
